items.sentence: Tom has had his leg in a cast for a few weeks now.
Tom has never had to work hard in his entire life.
Tom helps Mary with her homework almost every day.
Tom is a janitor at the school where Mary teaches.
Tom served two months in jail for drunken driving.
Tom should be out of surgery in about three hours.
I want to thank you for what you\'ve done for Tom.
I wanted Tom to forgive Mary for what she\'d done.
I\'ve told you again and again to be more careful.
If I have enough time tomorrow, I\'ll go shopping.
